Sentence: Burdow, the father of the boy who killed Jethro's sister, Mary
Burdow rides with Jethro for a while, and initially Jethro is scared, but Mr
Burdow explains that he (Burdow) thinks one of the men from the store is waiting for Jethro down the road
Burdow is able to prevent him (Burdow) from hurting Jethro
Jethro makes it home and tells his (Burdow) family about the encounter
